name: Moon and Stars 5
description:
Moon and Stars 5
Original painting in gouache and acrylic ink on watercolour paper
8x10" / 20x25cm
© Natasha Newton 2013

Moon and Stars 5 is an original painting featuring a half moon against an inky night sky twinkling with stars. It is painted on lightly textured watercolour paper, high quality and acid free. The painting is titled, signed and dated on the reverse, and is also signed on the front in pencil. It is an 8x10" standard size, ready for you to frame easily. Image size is 5.25" / 13.5cm in diameter.

Do you like this painting but would prefer a different size? I'd be happy to work on something similar for you. Just contact me for a list of sizes and prices!

This painting will be very carefully packaged to reach you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £3.50
Everywhere else: £6.00

name: Dream of the Stars 4
description:
Dream of the Stars 4
Original painting in gouache and acrylic ink on watercolour paper
8x10" / 20x25cm
© Natasha Newton 2013

Dream of the Stars 4 is a magical night landscape with mountains reaching up to the stars in the night sky above, while smoke from a campfire rises in the background.

It is painted on lightly textured watercolour paper, high quality and acid free. The painting is titled, signed and dated on the reverse, and is also signed on the front in pencil. It is an 8x10" standard size, ready for you to frame easily. Image size is 5" / 12.5cm in diameter.

Do you like this painting but would prefer a different size? I'd be happy to work on something similar for you. Just contact me for a list of sizes and prices!

This painting will be very carefully packaged to reach you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £3.50
Everywhere else: £6.00

name: Imaginary Star Chart Number 7
description:
Imaginary Star Chart Number 7
Original painting in gouache and acrylic ink on watercolour paper
8x10" / 20x25cm
© Natasha Newton 2013

Imaginary Star Chart Number 7 is a finely detailed original painting in a beautiful, rich midnight blue on lightly textured watercolour paper, high quality and acid free. The star chart is 14cm (5.5") in diameter on a 20x25cm (8x10") sheet of paper. Each star chart is totally unique and one of a kind.

The painting is titled, signed and dated on the reverse, and is also titled and signed on the front in pencil. It is a standard size, ready for you to frame easily and large enough to make a real impact on your wall. 

Do you like this painting but would prefer a different size? I'd be happy to work on something similar for you. Just contact me for a list of sizes and prices!

This painting will be very carefully packaged to reach you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £3.50
Everywhere else: £6.00

name: Nest Number Seven
description:
>> I am in Paris from 17th December 2013 until late January 2014. This painting will be available at the end of January, when I return to the UK. Please contact me if you would like to reserve or purchase this piece.

Nest Number Seven
Original painting in acrylic on deep-edge canvas
25x25cm / 10x10"
© Natasha Newton

This original painting is from my solo show last year, Ground & Sky. It was the piece chosen for the invitations to the private view, and is a personal favourite. It's also one of the last available paintings from my Nest series of 2012.

The deep edges of the canvas are painted grey and the painting is ready to hang. It is signed with a small 'N' on the front, and titled, dated and signed on the reverse.

This painting will be very carefully packaged and placed in a strong box to ensure it reaches you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £8.50
Everywhere else: £15.00

name: Nest Number Nine
description:
>> I am in Paris from 17th December 2013 until late January 2014. This painting will be available at the end of January, when I return to the UK. Please contact me if you would like to reserve or purchase this piece.

Nest Number Nine
Original painting in acrylic on linen gallery-wrapped canvas
60x60cm / 24x24"
© Natasha Newton

This large original painting is one of the few remaining pieces from my solo show last autumn, Ground & Sky. It's also one of the last available paintings from my Nest series of 2012. The delicately-painted white feathers contrast beautifully with the earthy brown tones of the twigs and the speckled eggs.

The sides of the canvas are approximately 1.75cm deep. The painting is designed to be hung unframed, but you could choose to frame this piece if you wish. It is signed with a small 'N' on the front, and titled, dated and signed on the reverse.

This painting will be very carefully packaged and placed in a strong box to ensure it reaches you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £20.00
Everywhere else: £45.00

name: PRE-ORDER - Intermission Limited Edition Print - Vertical
description:
>> PRE-ORDER << I am in Paris from 17th December 2013 until late January 2014. This print can still be purchased but will not ship until the end of January, when I return to the UK. You will receive an email update to let you know when your print has been sent. Thank you!

A limited edition, high quality, archival 14 x 11.5" (35.5 x 29cm) print from my original painting 'Intermission 2'. The image size is 11 x 8.5" (28 x 21.5cm) with a white border.

This exact print is limited to an edition of just 20. Each print is titled, signed, dated, and numbered by hand in the bottom right corner.

Printed on beautiful archival and acid-free art paper with Epson pigment inks, which are colour fast for 100+ years. The pigment inks capture the depth and detail of the original piece of artwork.

You can find the horizontal version of this print here: http://www.natashanewton.bigcartel.com/product/intermission-limited-edition-print-horizontal

All limited edition prints will be carefully wrapped in acid-free tissue paper and packaged in a wide, sturdy tube to ensure they reach you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £4.50
Everywhere else: £8.00

name: The Story of Existence
description:
>> I am in Paris from 17th December 2013 until late January 2014. This painting will be available at the end of January, when I return to the UK. Please contact me if you would like to reserve or purchase this piece.

The Story of Existence
Original painting in acrylic on gallery-wrapped canvas
45x35cm / 18x14"
© Natasha Newton

This original painting is from my solo show last autumn, Ground & Sky. It features a tiny brown bird with golden wings looking at the stars and moon in the inky night sky, perched on his branch high up in the forest. He is delicately painted with a variety of patterns, including the branches of the trees he loves on his breast.

The edges of the canvas are approximately 1.75cm deep and are painted the same colour as the sky. The painting is designed to be hung unframed, but you could choose to frame this piece if you wish. It is signed with a small 'N' on the front, and titled, dated and signed on the reverse.

This painting will be very carefully packaged and placed in a strong box to ensure it reaches you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £15.00
Everywhere else: £30.00

name: Nomadic Winds
description:
A simplified version of this painting (before I added the stars and rising smoke in the background) is the cover art for the new album by the Paris-based Trio d'Argent, titled Suite Nomade - released soon!

Nomadic Winds
Original painting in gouache and acrylic ink on watercolour paper
8x8" / 20x20cm
© Natasha Newton 2013

Nomadic Winds is a magical night landscape painting on lightly textured watercolour paper, high quality and acid free. The painting is titled, signed and dated on the reverse, and will also be signed on the front in pencil, underneath the image in the white border.

Do you like this painting but would prefer a different size? I'd be happy to work on something similar for you. Just contact me for a list of sizes and prices!

This painting will be very carefully packaged to reach you in perfect condition.

Shipping:

UK: £3.50
Everywhere else: £6.00
